text: help America's balance of payments position. He said bluntly in Washington yesterday that the offer -357million -was not good enough. And he indicated that his Government would try to get Germany to pay more. He did not mention personal talks with Dr. Adenauer, the West German Chancellor.

And he indicated that his Government would try to get Germany to pay more. He did not mention personal talks with Dr. Adenauer, the West German Chancellor.
